sentences.en: A soft hairdo helped to subdue her heavy features.
sentences.cn: 柔和的发型使她忧郁的模样变得好看些了.

sentences.en: Are we here to surf or swap hairdo secrets?
sentences.cn: 我们是到这来冲浪还是来交换护发心得的?

sentences.en: He came out with his new hairdo and played big.
sentences.cn: 他不仅带来的新发型,也带来了精彩的表演.

sentences.en: Her hairdo and make - up look positively ghastly!
sentences.cn: 她的发型和脂粉看上去真令人恶心!

sentences.en: Her short brown hair was curled in a puffy bouffant hairdo.
sentences.cn: 她棕色的卷卷的短发蓬松鼓起.

sentences.en: How do you like my new hairdo?
sentences.cn: 你觉得我的新发型怎么样？

sentences.en: I like your outfit and hairdo!
sentences.cn: 你的衣服和发型真好看！

sentences.en: I mean I'm so excited with my new hairdo.
sentences.cn: 我的意思是我太兴奋了我的新发型.

sentences.en: I'm ready for a new hairdo. Do you have any suggestions?
sentences.cn: 我准备换个新发型, 你有什么建议 吗 ?

sentences.en: Mary laughed at Barbara's hairdo. Barbara told Mary where to head in.
sentences.cn: 玛丽嘲笑巴巴拉的发型, 巴巴拉把玛丽训斥了一通.

sentences.en: Pamela Tudsbury clattered away at a typewriter, in her mauve evening dress and fancy hairdo.
sentences.cn: 帕米拉·塔茨伯利穿着淡紫色晚礼服,梳着别致的发式,正在打字机上咔嗒咔嗒地打着.

sentences.en: That hairdo looks really good on you.
That hairdo takes years off you.
sentences.cn: 那种发型使你显得年轻.

sentences.en: The new hairdo effected a startling change in her appearance.
sentences.cn: 指对行为、格或观点等产生潜移默化的影响.

sentences.en: The wind will always blow opposite to your hairdo.
sentences.cn: 风永远不顺着你的发型吹.

sentences.en: Your hairdo is so yummy, almost unreal.
sentences.cn: 你的发型做得太好了, 好得都叫人难以相信是直的了.

trans.tran_en: the style in which someone’s hair is cut or shaped
